# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

Release versions that will receive security updates.

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 2.x     | ✅ |
| < 2.0   | ❌                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

# Security policy

## Supported versions

Release versions that will receive security updates.

| Version | Supported      |
| ------- | -------------- |
| 3.x     | ✅            |
| 2.x     | ⚠️ Deprecated |
| < 2.0   | ❌            |
